widget.header: Take a Look at the Ongoing Development of Our Consumer Portal

config: New Tax Law Pages Added to Justia Mexico Portal. Our team continues to expand our resources to consumers. This month we added new information to the Tax Law Center covering various topics, such as tax returns, tax debts guarantees, contentious administrative trials, and the administrative revocation process.

Updates to COVID-19 Center. We revised our 50-state surveys on restrictions, mask mandates, travel, court operations, and housing protections so that they are current for the start of 2022 and the ongoing Omicron surge.
Law School Case Outlines. We completed additional resources for law students on the core topics of Contracts, Professional Responsibility, and Evidence.
